text: Proud to be part of the new @FargoPolice music video to help bring together law enforcement & the Fargo community & raise awareness about all the great work they do to keep our communities safe. Watch here. #ItsTime https://t.co/E4lWFchENA

So sad to hear about the loss of Rae Ann Kelsch—a wonderful person and friend. She represented Mandan with empathy and a desire to do good both as a state legislator and in the private sector. Darwin, Ali, Nathan and I join so many in Mandan in praying for the Kelsch family.

On this day in 2013, I introduced my first bill in the US Senate—which became law in 2016—to create a national Commission on Native American Children to conduct an intensive study into the complex challenges facing Native children & help change outcomes. https://t.co/eFzshsT3Vx

Saddened by the news of Bernie Kuntz’s passing, whose iconic @jamestownsun weekly column so often captured the magic & joy of all the outdoors has to offer. As a @UofNorthDakota alum & a veteran, his writing was always a dependable slice of ND values. https://t.co/2KpvyhPKJU

With my #RESPONSEAct—which became law—I’ve worked to support our 1st responders so they have the tools & training to handle hazardous incidents like crude oil train derailments. Introduced bill following crude oil train derailment in Casselton in 2013. Follow along to learn more.

#HappyHalloween! My staff in Bismarck are really showing off their Halloween spirit today. I hope everyone has a fun & safe time trick-or-treating this evening. Tweet your favorite costumes & decorations! https://t.co/3MM1jNlIon

Bleak picture for ND farmers: new @USDA data show soybean exports to China—North Dakota's largest market—down 97% over last year. This #tradewar is bad for North Dakota farmers. https://t.co/1NahTT4xiu

Since joining the US Senate, I’ve worked to make sure women, children & those most vulnerable in our communities are protected. With my #StrongSafe Communities Initiative—launched in 2014—I’ve continued my long fight to stop #humantrafficking in ND, US & around the world.

I’ve been working for years in the US Senate to combat the opioid, drug & substance addiction crisis impacting towns & families across ND. My Strong & Safe Communities Initiative—launched in 2014—has been a key part in helping make sure ND's communities & families remain safe.

Happy birthday to North Dakota, which became the 39th state 129 years ago today! I’m so proud to be working on behalf of the people of our beautiful state, which continues to have so much to offer. #NDLegendary https://t.co/RezmipNzY9

North Dakotans known that agriculture & community go hand-in-hand. Nothing embodies those values better than folks like Donna Stumphf in Grand Forks, who has been donating vegetables to those in need—nearly 3,100 pounds of them! #SelflessSaturday https://t.co/2wIeWwJ6MB

Since I’ve been in public office, I’ve worked to provide resources to address recurring mental health challenges like depression, supporting children exposed to trauma, helping those struggling with addiction, & preventing suicide. Follow along to learn how.
Another incredible win today for @NDSUfootball vs @YoungstownStFB, keeping an unstoppable streak alive! #GoBison

Bison are woven into ND's heritage—long playing an important role in Native cultures, to the 1st homesteaders on the plains & to the modern day—proud to help designate today as #NationalBisonDay to recognize the historical, cultural & economic impact bison have & continue to have https://t.co/Jvrae7Nbob
With winter around the corner, take the time to prepare your family, home, & vehicles for the cold weather. On #SafetySunday, read more winter safety tips from @KXNewsMinot https://t.co/2DO5ao1hqd

Every day, I come to work in the US Senate fighting for North Dakota. My parents taught me that we could disagree, but at the end of the day, we always worked to together to put the Christmas lights up. Those are the values that I’ve brought to the Senate. https://t.co/oo4otYqiMx
Last year, I sat down w/ @rcnewsmonitor to share my journey from growing up in the small town of Mantador to serving North Dakota in the U.S. Senate. Read more here: https://t.co/UAFhzK3mgt

As I’ve traveled across North Dakota, I’ve heard strong concerns about the administration’s intensifying #tradewar. On @Medium, read how I’ve been fighting for smart trade policies to support North Dakota agriculture, manufacturing, & energy producers. https://t.co/HemfoL5mjQ

ND farmer Jon Casavant from Rugby shared a window into the day in a life of a farmer & how concerns over trade, the weather & day-to-day challenges of farm life impact North Dakotan farmers, their families & their communities. Read his story on @Medium: https://t.co/ThfhIx0wbK

No one wants China to cheat on trade, but tariffs aren’t the way to help our farmers succeed. In July, @CNBC reported from ND to hear from leaders on trade like the Executive Director of the ND Trade Office on what’s at stake if the administration’s #tradewar continues. https://t.co/RECvYEN6R4

In April at an Ag Committee hearing I reminded @USDA @SecretarySonny of the 3 words he said when we first met: "trade, trade, trade." I pushed him to stand up for rural America & protect ag producers who are rightfully worried about the #tradewar https://t.co/xdLwS86Y3V

Had a great time at the #BarleyToBarstool discussion in May to talk about the importance of trade to ND ag producers. We need smart trade policy so the barley & other products we export to Mexico, Canada, & elsewhere can reach the 95% of the world’s consumers outside of the U.S. https://t.co/Sa8T7gkufj

Earlier this year, I helped pass a U.S. Senate #FarmBill w/ overwhelming bipartisan support which includes many wins for ND that I fought for. Senate bill would give our ag economy a needed boost as it faces damaging uncertainty from the administration’s trade policies. https://t.co/EuaGXA27MC

Since we passed the last #FarmBill in 2014, I’ve been working hard on #FarmBill18 to make sure it addresses the needs of North Dakota farmers & ranchers. Read more on @Medium abt my meetings this year to make sure their voices are heard. https://t.co/48PNwOJwyl

Avg age of a farmer in ND is almost 60 yrs old. My bipartisan #NextGenAg bill I included in the 2018 bipartisan Senate #FarmBill would help grow the next generation of farmers & ranchers & make sure they get education needed for a lifetime of success. https://t.co/ruGqy1Bri5

Recently, I met w/ @NDFFA state officers Brianna Maddock & Caleb Boehm who shared how my #NextGenAg bill I successfully included in the Senate #FarmBill would help improve the future of agriculture in ND by providing resources to build the next generation of new/beginning farmers https://t.co/LQcv2lgYQC

In a recent episode of my podcast #TheHotdish, I spoke w/ fmr @USDA Sec. Tom Vilsack & Ryan Pederson, a ND farmer & @NDSoybean VP abt the importance of the #FarmBill to rural America, our concerns abt the administration’s trade war, & more. Listen here: https://t.co/aqjRLExn9q

On @Medium, watch the stories from some of the nearly 300,000 NDans w/ pre-existing conditions. The @TheJusticeDept's decided to turn its back on them by refusing to defend protections for those w/ pre-existing conditions in the current health care law. https://t.co/s1KBIl16Rj

In my op-ed, read the story of Kathryn & her daughter Valerie from Mandan to see what’s at stake after the administration turned its back on millions of Americans & nearly 300,000 NDans w/ pre-existing conditions by not defending the health care law https://t.co/NTbayv6zwn

I worked for a year & a half to negotiate a bipartisan deal to lift the ban on exporting in oil in 2015. I’m proud of this achievement on behalf of ND’s energy industry & hard-working Americans. Now we’re seeing the results for ND. Here’s how it happened: https://t.co/5g8i2A7L0W

As US oil exports reach record levels, in a recent op-ed, I looked back at why it’s happening: 3 yrs ago Congress lifted the ban on exporting oil, which I worked on for 1.5 yrs to build support, reach a deal & get votes to pass it. Read more in @gfherald https://t.co/yg40WK1leZ

In 2015, I successfully worked to negotiate a deal in Congress to lift the 40 year old ban on exporting oil & we’re now seeing the results for North Dakota and our country. It’s an important victory for our energy & national security. Read more via @axios https://t.co/jvcXqy8LpU

This February, my bipartisan #FUTUREAct became law which creates a path forward for coal jobs in ND while reducing emissions. Read more on @Medium abt how this win builds on my decades-long fight for ND energy. https://t.co/XJhIfie0e0

Read more about the unique bipartisan coalition I successfully built for my #FUTUREAct which is now law to make sure we’re moving sensible energy policy forward for North Dakota in this @axios article from @AmyAHarder: https://t.co/uPtx2UOG9t

WATCH: Last year w/ @SenWhitehouse @SenCapito & @SenJohnBarrasso I reintroduced the #FUTUREAct to extend 45Q tax credit to promote carbon capture while reducing emissions. It was signed into law this February, in a major victory for an all-of-the-above energy strategy. https://t.co/ZmBde72K0L

This @washingtonpost story from 2016 highlights how my #FUTUREAct—which became law earlier this year—is an example of how we can find common ground on the divisive issue of carbon if we work across the aisle—just as I try to do every day in the Senate. https://t.co/06Br4N2gMS

Since joining the US Senate, I’ve fought against #humantrafficking, raised awareness about challenges in Indian Country, supported our #veterans, pushed for a federal paid leave policy, & worked to keep ND communities strong, safe, and healthy. Follow along for more highlights:

Language barriers, prohibitive ID requirements, unreliable rural mail delivery & other issues create barriers to voting for Native Americans in rural areas. I spoke in a US Senate committee earlier this year on how to address so voting is accessible, simple, & fair for everyone. https://t.co/3FHOHntwif

Proud to attend the promotion ceremony for my friend @NDNationalGuard's Debra Lien, promoted to Colonel this weekend. Great to see strong & capable women in leadership in ND who continue to inspire women across our state to meet the opportunities & challenges the future holds. https://t.co/DFlmrF3CHK

As a nation, we owe our veterans a deep debt of gratitude & respect—not just on #VeteransDay, but every day by making sure they can access the resources they've earned. Visited West Fargo VFW @Post7564 to help honor ND servicemembers & veterans for their commitment & sacrifice. https://t.co/FlF4qoSQjd

Today a U.S. Senate committee voted to move my bill #SavannasAct forward that I introduced to help address the epidemic of missing & murdered Native American women & help law enforcement crack down on these horrible crimes. https://t.co/BXFYap9Rbo

#SavannasAct cleared a hurdle in the US Senate today, but it’s just a 1st step in fully dealing w/ the #MMIWG epidemic. I'll stand w/ these women & continue this fight long after I leave the Senate to make sure they are #NotInvisible. https://t.co/88PSq9Siil

Dennis Kooren & I have become great friends as we work to save the Central States Pension Fund that is at risk of becoming involvement leaving about 2,000 NoDaks w/o their pensions. We have to work together to make sure hard working folks receive the retirement they earned. https://t.co/n4c7XEaPRS

Most North Dakotans live in rural areas & maintaining access to quality health care is critical to keeping our communities strong & safe. Thank you to the health care professionals in ND & across rural America who provide top-notch care for rural patients. #NationalRuralHealthDay https://t.co/AhcPKcetVE

This week, a US Senate committee moved my bill, #SavannasAct, forward. Proud of this progress toward addressing the epidemic of missing & murdered Native American women in our country. Congress must pass this bill now. Read more in the @BisTrib. #MMIWG https://t.co/7Uz5AwuBhs

#WorldPancreaticCancerDay is a great reminder about the continuing need to raise awareness & increase resources for research into #PancreaticCancer solutions. This summer, I met w/ @PanCAN to discuss how to better invest federal dollars to fighting this disease. https://t.co/I7J0mSQMGX
